s0101: Bo Qin ascended position after, had Guan, Cai etc. rebel, Huai Yi, Xu Rong also together rose rebel.
s0102: Then Bo Qin led troops attacked them at Xi, made Xi oath, said: 'Array your armor weapons, none dare not good.
s0104: Horse oxen their wind, minister concubine fled, not dare cross pursue, respectfully return them.
s0105: None dare plunder steal, cross wall fences.
s0106: Lu people three suburbs three tunnels, prepare your fodder grain, dry provisions, stakes beams, none dare not reach.
s0107: I Jia Xu built attacked Xu Rong, none dare not reach, have great punishment.'
s0108: Made this Xi oath, then pacified Xu Rong, settled Lu.
s0109: Lu Gong Bo Qin died, son Kao Gong Qiu established.
s0110: Kao Gong four years died, established younger brother Xi, this called Yang Gong.
s0111: Yang Gong built Mao Que gate.
s0112: Six years died, son You Gong Zai established.
s0114: You Gong younger brother Fei killed You Gong self established, this was Wei Gong.
s0115: Wei Gong fifty years died, son Li Gong Zhuo established.
s0116: Li Gong thirty-seven years died, Lu people established his younger brother Ju, this was Xian Gong.
s0117: Xian Gong thirty-two years died, son Zhen Gong Bi established.
s0118: Zhen Gong fourteen years, Zhou Li Wang no way, went fleeing Zhu, republican administered government.
s0119: Twenty-nine years, Zhou Xuan Wang ascended throne.
s0120: Thirty years, Zhen Gong died, younger brother Ao established, this was Wu Gong.
s0121: Wu Gong nine years spring, Wu Gong with eldest son Kuo, youngest son Xi, west court Zhou Xuan Wang.
s0122: Xuan Wang loved Xi, wished establish Xi as Lu crown prince.
s0123: Zhou's Fan Zhong Shan Fu advised Xuan Wang said: 'Abolish eldest establish youngest, not follow;
s0124: not follow, must violate Wang command;
s0125: violate Wang command, must execute: so issue command cannot not follow.
s0126: Command not walk, government not establish;
s0127: walk not follow, people will abandon above.
s0128: Below serve above, young serve old, so for follow.
s0129: Now heavenly son establishes feudal lords, establishes their young, is teach people rebel.
s0130: If Lu follows it, feudal lords imitate it, Wang command will have blocked;
s0131: if not follow execute it, is self execute Wang command.
s0132: Execute also loss, not execute also loss, Wang his plan it.'
s0133: Xuan Wang not listen, finally established Xi as Lu crown prince.
s0134: Summer, Wu Gong returned died, Xi established, this was Yi Gong.
s0135: Yi Gong nine years, Yi Gong elder brother Kuo's son Bo Yu with Lu people attacked assassinated Yi Gong, established Bo Yu as lord.
s0136: Bo Yu ascended position eleven years, Zhou Xuan Wang attacked Lu, killed its lord Bo Yu, inquired Lu gong zi able guide follow feudal lords, to make Lu successor.
s0137: Fan Mu Zhong said: 'Lu Yi Gong younger brother Cheng, solemn respectful bright spirits, respectful served elders;
s0138: assigned affairs executed punishments, must ask previous teachings consult old practices;
s0139: not interfere asked, not violate consulted.'
s0140: Xuan Wang said: 'Yes, able teach govern his people.'
s0141: Then established Cheng at Yi Gong palace, this was Xiao Gong.
s0142: From this after, feudal lords many rebelled Wang command.
s0143: Xiao Gong twenty-five years, feudal lords rebelled Zhou, Quan Rong killed You Wang.
s0144: Qin began ranked as feudal lords.
s0145: Twenty-seven years, Xiao Gong died, son Fu Nang established, this was Hui Gong.
s0146: Hui Gong thirty years, Jin people assassinated their lord Zhao Hou.
s0147: Forty-five years, Jin people again assassinated their lord Xiao Hou.
s0148: Forty-six years, Hui Gong died, long concubine son Xi acted held country, walked lord affairs, this was Yin Gong.
s0149: Initially, Hui Gong proper wife no sons, duke lowly concubine Sheng Zi gave birth son Xi.
